Class CommunityAuth

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.harvard.integer.access.snmp.SnmpAuthentication
      • edu.harvard.integer.access.snmp.CommunityAuth
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Authentication, java.lang.Comparable<SnmpAuthentication>

    public class CommunityAuth
extends SnmpAuthentication
    The Class CommunityAccess contains access information for SNMPv2 and SNMPv1 access.
